metadata.title: CVE-2019-11725 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: When a user navigates to site marked as unsafe by the Safebrowsing API,warning messages are displayed and navigation is interrupted but resourcesfrom the same site loaded through websockets are not blocked, leading tothe loading of unsafe resources and bypassing safebrowsing protections.This vulnerability affects Firefox < 68.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
